title: DC Metro Status Configuration
description: Configuration for WMATA DC Metro real-time status display with live train arrivals

enabled.description: Enable or disable the DC Metro Status plugin

wmata_api_key.title: WMATA API Key
wmata_api_key.description: Your WMATA API key from https://developer.wmata.com/

reference_station.title: Reference Station
reference_station.description: The metro station to display arrivals for

refresh_interval.title: Refresh Interval
refresh_interval.description: How often to refresh train data in seconds (10-300)

page_display_time.title: Page Display Time
page_display_time.description: How long to display each direction page in seconds (5-60)

display_options.title: Display Options
display_options.description: Fine-grained control over text display behavior

show_line_abbreviation.description: Show train line abbreviation (RD, OR, SV, etc.)

scroll_long_destinations.description: Scroll destination names that are longer than display width

scroll_speed.title: Scroll Speed
scroll_speed.description: Text scroll speed divisor (higher = slower, lower = faster). Range: 1-20
